name: EAR_ID_HX
description: This table contains the historic Identity ID information for the guarantor.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this row. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this row.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID
columns.description: The historical IDs for the guarantor.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The historic type of ID for the guarantor.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The historic user who updated the ID for the guarantor.

columns.name: MPI_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MPI_HX_AUDIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The historic type of change for the guarantor ID.

columns.name: MPI_HX_NEW_ID
columns.description: The historical ID that was added for the guarantor.

columns.name: MPI_HX_DOTONE
columns.description: The guarantor record ID where the ID change was made.

columns.name: MPI_HX_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The historical effective date for the guarantor ID.

columns.name: MPI_HX_TO_DATE
columns.description: The historical end date for the guarantor ID.
